title: Help! i cant get my mystery gift
body:
i got sent a mystery gift from riot saying i got something. When i clicked OK it closed and i haven't found anything new
If i have gotten a gift please tell me what it is or send me another one as compensation and player satisfaction thank you riot.

Yours sincerely
Pur3gh0st99

replies.body:
Hey there,

This was more than likely your receival of the Draven Day icons, the reason the message stated it was a **Mystery Gift** is that this is the default gift type displayed whenever an item is added to your account.

Check out your **Purchase History** in the store and you'll see what was added to your account.
This is Correct, i thought the exact same thing as the OP
